titles.title: To increase the authorization for the development company loan and debenture guarantee program administered by the Small Business Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Lafalce moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for various loan programs (including the development company loan and debenture guarantee program) administered through the Small Business Administration.
